about_the_game:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please note that: This version is mainly aimed at North America. At present, the server is deployed in Silicon Valley.It is not recommended that players from other countries and regions buy this product now.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is a multiplayer game that combines football and action games. The core of the game draws on the essence of football and action games, while also creating some very interesting rules. Let the player play more excitingly!

The basic rule of the game is simple: to get the ball into the other side's goal, no matter how or how you use it or the strategy. The other side to grab the ball or you go to grab the ball, OK, you don't need to be polite, wave your fist or hand weapon, give the opponent a color look.

However, you need to be extra careful with the powerful monsters on the pitch, as they can kill you at any time.

You can be a master manipulator, a resourceful commander, or something else interesting.

Roles can use task rewards to upgrade equipment and skills.

There are single-player mode and multiplayer mode, multiplayer mode after completing the simple difficulty level 3. Multiplayer mode currently includes 1V1, 2V2, 3V3, 5V5, and The map of 10v10 has been added to the product.

This version has 12 levels, many monsters, currently, only one character is available, followed by new levels, roles, and monsters.

name: ball heroes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7.0
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 /AMD 290 similar or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,Windows 8,Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 /AMD 290 similar or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space

short_description: The core gameplay takes the essence of soccer, while creating some very interesting rules to make it even more exciting! The basic rules of the game are simple, but it's up to the player to figure out a variety of skill combinations and team cooperation strategies.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*
*languages with full audio support
